about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Our mission and values
about.description: Ruby is dedicated to making healthcare accessible and convenient for everyone. We connect patients with qualified healthcare specialists through secure, easy-to-use video consultations.
about.missionText: To provide accessible, high-quality healthcare consultations from anywhere, at any time.
about.valuesText: We believe in patient-centered care, privacy, and using technology to improve healthcare outcomes.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we protect your data
privacy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacy.dataCollectionText: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including your name, email address, and health information necessary for consultations.
privacy.dataUsageText: We use your information to provide healthcare services, communicate with you, and improve our platform.
privacy.dataSecurityText: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal and health information.
